price: 242. Na boye nde Allah azali kolimbola bino bilembo naye, mpo ete bososola.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yubayyinu al-lahu lakum āyātihi laʿallakum taʿqilūna
